title: __**Be safe**__
description: Discussing drugs with a risky safety profile, very high doses, unsafe drug combinations, and other forms that goes against harm reduction values **has** to include notes and/or sources explaining its dangers. Consciously giving harmful or bad advice can result in a ban, that includes jokes. Do not post information without being certain of it's validity and scientific basis, this is almost always best left to those with the 'Harm Reduction Advisor' role.
